vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.37;
son of: Binea (H1150);
brother of: Raphah (H7498) and Azel (H0682A);
father of: Ulam (H0198H), Jeush (H3266I) and Eliphelet (H0467J); also called Eshek at 1Ch.8.39;
Another name of el.a.sah (אֶלְעָשָׂה "Eleasah" H0501H)
§ Eshek = "oppressor"
a Benjamite, late descendant of Saul
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hermano de Asel; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以設 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "壓迫者"
一位便雅憫人, 掃羅的後代 #代上 8:39|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以设 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "压迫者"
一位便雅悯人, 扫罗的后代 #代上 8:39|
